setBytes32((bytes32,bytes32)[]).notice: Stores a bytes32 value at each key in `_slots`.

setBytes32(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Stores a bytes32 `_value` at `_slot`. Any storage slots that         are packed should be set through this interface.

setBytes32((bytes32,bytes32)[]).notice: Stores a bytes32 value at each key in `_slots`.

setBytes32(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Stores a bytes32 `_value` at `_slot`. Any storage slots that         are packed should be set through this interface.

userdoc.notice: A simple contract that allows setting arbitrary storage slots.         WARNING: this contract is not safe to be called by untrusted parties.         It is only meant as an intermediate step during upgrades.

documentation.text:

         are packed should be set through this interface.
